title: Don Chuck Monogatari (Don Chuck Stories)
synopsis: Young beaver Chuck's adventure with his little friends. When thy are in trouble, Chuck often asks his father to help them out.
staff: [['Takagaki, Kouzou', ['Episode Director']], ['Oosugi, Kumiko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Tanaka, Eiji', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Koizumi, Shizuo', ['Original Creator']]]
